definition: fifth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fifth in order/letter "E" or Roman "V" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/penta

sentences.english: Chlorination occurs adjacent to the isoprene units to form allylic chlorines.
sentences.chinese: 氯化發生在異戊二烯單元附近形成烯丙基氯。

sentences.english: Quenching the excess lithium metal was achieved with isoprene.
sentences.chinese: 鋰金屬淬火超額實現與異戊二烯。

sentences.english: Isoprene needs to be extremely pure to make synthetic rubber.
sentences.chinese: 而異戊二烯必須極其純淨才能生產出合成橡膠。

sentences.english: Isoprene could be deeply hydrogenated to isopentane on nickel catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 異戊二烯在鎳基催化劑作用下可深度加氫爲異戊烷。

sentences.english: And one of the molecules I study is called isoprene, which is here.
sentences.chinese: 我研究的分子之一，叫做異戊二烯，就是這個。
